Any changes that this gets fixed? It makes editing files a pain. Once I have
that error I can no longer access the LRU list and have to reopen the file.

I cannot duplicate this in 0317 or higher. TabbedEditorWorkbook (from the stack)

as a side effect of that work. Please reopen if you can get this with the most
recent builds.. Thanks
